Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Poisonous \Poi"son*ous\, a. Having the qualities or effects of poison; venomous; baneful; corrupting; noxious. --Shak. -- {Poi"son*ous*ly}, adv. -- {Poi"son*ous*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]

poisonous adj 1: having the qualities or effects of a poison [syn: {toxicant}] 2: not safe to eat 3: marked by deep ill will; deliberately harmful; "a malevolent lie"; "poisonous hate...in his eyes"- Ernest Hemingway; "venomous criticism"; "vicious gossip" [syn: {venomous}, {vicious}]
